name: Vista Outdoor Inc.
description: Vista Outdoor Inc. is a leading global outdoor sports and recreation company that designs, manufactures, and markets a wide range of products for shooting sports, outdoor activities, and active lifestyle consumers. Founded in 2015 and headquartered in Anoka, Minnesota, the company has a rich heritage with many well-known brands under its umbrella, including Federal Ammunition, Bushnell, and CamelBak. Vista Outdoor operates in two segments: Shooting Sports and Outdoor Products. The Shooting Sports segment focuses on the production of ammunition, firearms, and accessories, while the Outdoor Products segment offers products for camping, climbing, cycling, and other outdoor activities. With a commitment to innovation and quality, Vista Outdoor strives to enhance the outdoor experience for its customers through high-performance products and sustainable practices. The company is dedicated to fostering a culture of safety, community engagement, and environmental stewardship, ensuring that the outdoor spaces enjoyed by millions are preserved for future generations. Vista Outdoor also actively participates in advocacy and education initiatives related to outdoor recreation and shooting sports, aiming to inspire and educate new generations of outdoor enthusiasts.
